snippet.title: "Rosttle",My First Survivors-Like Indiegame
snippet.description:
"Vampire Survivors is a fantastic game. I'm developing a game where just moving the character can be fun and offer unique strategic thinking. Check out my indie game on Steam for a taste of this! #IndieGame #VampireSurvivors"
